item.title: Tamme's family and their understanding of the languages spoken in their country
item.summary: Tamme and his family have seen and understand different people in their country. Tamme understands the languages spoken by the Ovambo, the Ovaherero and the Namaqua.
item.comments: 1) See also Different peoples and Bushmen in !nanni and Tamme's country, 2) This story is found in Book XI & XII-3
item.author: Tamme (XII)
